Method Detail

getDatabase

public java.lang.String getDatabase()
Returns database name. If using plural names, the database name comes from database_id, otherwise, it comes from databases_id;

Returns:
database name

getTable

public java.lang.String getTable()
Returns table name. If using plural names, the table name comes from table_id, otherwise, it comes from tables_id;

Returns:
table name

getTableKey

public java.lang.String getTableKey()
Returns table key. If using plural names, the table key is table_id, otherwise, it is tables_id;

Returns:
table key

getView

public java.lang.String getView()
Returns view name. If using plural names, the view name comes from view_id, otherwise, it comes from views_id;

Returns:
view name

getViewKey

public java.lang.String getViewKey()
Returns view key. If using plural names, the view key is view_id, otherwise, it is views_id;

Returns:
view key
